# rehype-remove-comments

Remove comments (except conditional comments).

When configured with `force: true` (default: `false`), conditional
comments are also removed.

## Install

```sh
npm install rehype-remove-comments
```

## Example

##### In

```html
<!--Hello-->
<!--[if IE 6]>OK<![endif]-->
```

##### Out

```html
<!--[if IE 6]>OK<![endif]-->
```
